entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening and after midnight. Snow mixed with rain beginning after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
